cmd/main.js
"use strict"; var docopt = require('docopt'); var fs = require('fs'); var Workspace = require("../lib/workspace"); var doc = fs.readFileSync(__dirname+"/docopt.txt").toString(); var cli = docopt.docopt(doc); if( cli.build ) { var workspace = new Workspace(); var Builder = require("../lib/build"); var builder = new Builder(workspace); builder.build(); } else if (cli.init) { console.log(process.cwd()); Workspace.initialize(process.cwd()); }
